original_text: And Ahab went into his house vexed and sullen because of what Naboth the Jezreelite had said to him, for he had said, “I will not give you the inheritance of my fathers.” And he lay down on his bed and turned away his face and would eat no food.
korean_text: 이스르엘 사람 나봇이 아합에게 대답하여 이르기를 내 조상의 유산을 왕께 줄 수 없다 하므로 아합이 근심하고 답답하여 왕궁으로 돌아와 침상에 누워 얼굴을 돌리고 식사를 아니하니
